name: Elis in Winterland
description:
In the Winterland wheere everyone is in a deep winter slumber, an early summer has arrived.
Can Elis, the only one awake, save the Winterland?

"Elis in the Winterland" is an action-defense game where utilizes Elis' magics and the power of her Winterland's friends to fend off the summer heat.

As a player, you contol Elis to summon defensive friends


and if necessary, you can use Elis' skills to defeat the enemies directly.


Combine the defensive friends and Elis' skills strategically to withstand the invasion of the Summer Kingdom.


If you endure the summer invasion until the end of the summer heat, you will achieve victory.


Endure it, for when winter is coming after summer departs.
